mapper.select: select distinct u.id from sys_user u inner join sys_user_dept ud on ud.user_id = u.id inner join sys_dept d on d.id = ud.dept_id inner join ( select n.notice_send_type, nsr.user_id, nsr.dept_id, nsr.dept_ancestors from sys_notice n left join sys_notice_send_relation nsr on nsr.notice_id = n.id where n.id = #{noticeId} ) n on ( n.notice_send_type = '0' or (n.notice_send_type = '1' and d.id = n.dept_id) or (n.notice_send_type = '2' and d.ancestors like concat(n.dept_ancestors, '%')) or (n.notice_send_type = '3' and u.id = n.user_id) ) where u.deleted = 0 and u.status = '0' and d.status = '0' and d.deleted = 0
